title: Ticket #5135: Force HTCondor web site to be HTTPS
description:
We currently have both an HTTP and an HTTPS site courtesy of the CSL. There is no reason to have both, and for the Grand Private Future, HTTPS is preferred. The CSL has directions on forcing people to the HTTPS version at https://csl.cs.wisc.edu/services/web . The magic incantation in our top level .htaccess file appears to be: 

  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteCond %{HTTPS} off
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} !^/status
  RewriteRule (.*) https://%{HTTP_HOST}%{REQUEST_URI}

(This ticket is a successor to #5028: HTCondor Web site broken in HTTPS)
creator: adesmet
